attributes.action: Call a general election to be held by 30 September 2009
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The authority and credibility of this Parliament has been so fatally damaged by the MPs expenses fiasco that only a fresh mandate from the British electorate can restore the necessary level of trust required in those commanded to direct the affairs of the nation at this critical moment in our history.

Some limited time is first required to allow parties and constituencies to de-select and replace as candidates to stand at the election those MPs potentially guilty of criminal offences and others who have demonstrated such a lack of integrity in their behaviour that they can no longer command the respect of their constituents

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
